mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM kh_permission p INNER JOIN kh_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN kh_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN kh_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY p.sort ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM kh_permission p INNER JOIN kh_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN kh_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN kh_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.type IN (0, 1) AND p.status = 1 AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY p.parent_id, p.sort ASC
